artificial_intelligence.description: Commands with the use of artificial intelligence or for interacting with the bot itself.

information.description: Commands for retrieving information about the bot, user or the group.

tools.description: Useful commands for fetching and other functions.

media.description: Commands related to media. e.g Music.

edited_images.description: Edited images and memes related commands are dumped here.

games.description: Free, Fun and Enjoying game commands.

gambling.description: An easy game to earn and loss a lot of money.

economy.description: Commands that was fun and related to economy system.

other.description: Commands which do not fit in either of the above categories.
